answers.answer: I am having a c section the last week of May.  Been doing well..but this last week has been a rough one. How are you?
I am june 9th ill be 25 weeks on sunday doing well minus sleeping ***** how r u doing
May 29th with my first. Seems like this is taking forever. Im always hunger and have gained 19lbs.

June 1st and i just noticed im in the single digit countdown :D 99 days left! Im.doing good ive only recently started really feeling pregnant waddling hard to get comfy feet swelling a little but other than that good :)
Hey Im due last week in May.feeling heavy now and fed up bein pregnant.

Im good just tired and picky. i am due june 4th but i havent gained any weight yet so i think thats why i am still comfortable. Im looking forward to my baby shower and working on his scrapbook. And i just love feeling him move!

I'm due June 12th. I'm currently 24 weeks 2 days. I'm really starting to show. I've gained 18 lbs. Just noticed my wedding ring is getting tight. I have a cold so my head is absolutely clogged, but besides that, not too bad. On Monday I had bad pain in my stomach near my belly button. Not sure if that was the baby growing or bh pains. But it went away. Now just really hoping not to have gestational diabetes.
Jenkay I felt like that today im like constantly eating but I don't feel full

I'm due on the 31st of May can't wait for our lil boy to come. Hubby hopes he's born in June like him coz his entire family are born in may lol and he told me to push till the 13th of June he's crazy!

I'm due June 7th wit my first... having a girl:) I've been lucky.. first trimester sucked!! But I'm 25+2 now nd everything is good!! Time.is.flying.by.so hope it keeps up!! Can't wait to finally have her here wit me:)
Due June 6th with a boy second boy, so far I just get pains in my hips when I walk for longer then 15ish minutes

Im due May 10th im 29wks +4 im sooo ready for may to be here the fatigue is bacccck n i dont hv a appitite.... I hv to make myslf snack n eat meals im more thirsty then hungry.Baby is doin well. Im having A Boy n he is growing Long n big i feel my body stretchn out!!!

question: Hey anyone expecting their baby between May & June & how are you coping !!!
title: May-June Babies !
